style: Clean Line Art, Flat Colors, Modern Anime Aesthetic, Japanese Pop Illustration
use_case: Video Game Assets, Sticker Packs, Character IP Development, Merchandising Guides
template: Official Character Model Sheet: A full-body, high-detail reference sheet for a [SUBJECT]. The character is prominently featured wearing a detailed [OUTFIT_STYLE] and has distinct [HAIRSTYLE_COLOR] hair. The final output MUST be a comprehensive sprite sheet layout displaying exactly 12-15 unique poses and expressions, including: full front view (T-pose), full back view, 3/4 profile, running stride, jumping/action pose, sitting/idle pose, and 2-3 specific facial expressions/close-ups. All elements are neatly arranged on a solid, uniform [BACKGROUND_COLOR] background. Style requirements: Masterpiece, 2D vector graphic illustration, crisp thick line art, flat uniform shading (cel shading), vibrant pastel color palette, clean aesthetic, high resolution, professional character design template, no complex environment textures, no text labels, no watermarks.

variable_explanations.SUBJECT: Defines the core character identity (e.g., 'A cynical college student', 'A playful fantasy elf', 'A futuristic robot').
variable_explanations.OUTFIT_STYLE: Controls the specific clothing aesthetic (e.g., '80s workout clothes', 'cyberpunk combat gear', 'medieval peasant robes').
variable_explanations.HAIRSTYLE_COLOR: Sets the character's hair details (e.g., 'short fiery red spikes', 'long silky black braids', 'bright purple twin buns').
variable_explanations.BACKGROUND_COLOR: Determines the solid, single color used for the entire sheet background (e.g., 'pastel yellow', 'deep forest green', 'pure white').

examples.prompt: Official Character Model Sheet: A full-body, high-detail reference sheet for a A playful forest sprite. The character is prominently featured wearing a detailed Moss-stitched tunic and leather belt and has distinct Wild braided auburn hair. The final output MUST be a comprehensive sprite sheet layout displaying exactly 12-15 unique poses and expressions, including: full front view (T-pose), full back view, 3/4 profile, running stride, jumping/action pose, sitting/idle pose, and 2-3 specific facial expressions/close-ups. All elements are neatly arranged on a solid, uniform Light Sage Green background. Style requirements: Masterpiece, 2D vector graphic illustration, crisp thick line art, flat uniform shading (cel shading), vibrant pastel color palette, clean aesthetic, high resolution, professional character design template, no complex environment textures, no text labels, no watermarks.

tips: Specify the number of poses (e.g., '12 poses') for tighter control over the density of the sheet.
Use color keywords (e.g., 'vibrant neon colors') within the [OUTFIT_STYLE] variable to ensure the clothes match the desired palette.
Utilize aspect ratios close to 3:4 or 9:16 (vertical) to best accommodate the full character and multiple poses.
description: A powerful template for generating production-ready character model sheets. Ideal for visual development, this style captures the vibrant energy and clean aesthetic of modern Japanese animation, providing multiple reusable poses in a single image.
instructions: Use this template to generate similar images.

suggestions: Consider: epic, rustic, dreamy, luminous, bold

priority_improvements: Provide the complete prompt package (title, template, variable examples, description, and proposed commercial details) so that a proper evaluation can be conducted against the specified criteria.

test_instructions: Fill in each variable with different values to test versatility.
Try using the first example prompt exactly as written as your baseline.
Test at least 3-5 different variations to ensure consistent style.
Experiment with Midjourney parameters like `--ar` or `--stylize`.
quality_checklist: Style Consistency: Does the style remain consistent?
Composition: Does the output match your compositional expectations?
Visual Quality: Is the output high-quality?
Variable Impact: Does changing variables produce meaningful differences?

commercial_description:
Unlock an entire arsenal of perfectly rendered, adorably consistent Kawaii character spritesheets instantly.

*   **Pixel-Perfect Consistency:** Generate multiple poses, expressions, and actions for a single character that maintain identical color palettes, line weights, and visual style across every frame—essential for game development and animation.
*   **Integrated Sprite Sheet Formatting:** Stop wasting time on manual layouts. This template automatically organizes your outputs into clean, usable grids suitable for immediate import into popular game engines (Unity, Godot, etc.).
*   **The "Ultra-Kawaii" Stylizer:** Go beyond basic cute. Our proprietary prompt architecture injects a professional-grade blend of Japanese street-style cuteness and clear, actionable sprite design, making your characters instantly marketable and unforgettable.

Perfect for indie game developers, animation hobbyists, digital sticker creators, and anyone needing high-volume, high-quality character assets.

Stop struggling with complex parameters and start creating your dream roster—if you can type a name, you can generate a professional spritesheet.
enhancement_log: Title fixed: Kawaii Character Sprite Sheet Design -> Whimsical Kawaii Sprite Sheet Design
